Announcements & News
Here you can find useful info about upcoming changes like new events, updates, fixes and other news. Its strongly recommended to check those pserver daily, stay informed all the time, it may be important!

Server Information
Here you can find all the informations about server like rates, detailed server features, all our event list and their reward as well some other gameplay informations so make sure to check here for more server details.

Events
~ Server EventsWe have implmented Nexus Event engine which is one of the best event engines in the world! There will be an automated event every 2 hour. You will found everything about automated events at "Favorite" tab.Some of our maain events are:
Main Events Team vs Team Capture the Flag Domination Mass Domination


Server statistics
Here you can check various server statistics like top pvp or pk, clan status, top online and others. You can also check raid status and to see if they are alive or not.

Support & Donations
Here you can find informations regarding our support for in-game problems or client related, you can find also informations on how to contact us and detailed Donate info as well.
